item.title: I saw her standing while sitting at the airport ga...
item.description:
I saw her standing while sitting at the airport gate, waiting for the flight to board. Itâd been delayed once, then delayed again, then delayed a third time. I didnât mind, because it gave me some more time to just look at her. God, was she something to look at. She was wearing an all-brown outfit, and boy, I didnât know all-brown could look so nice on someone. Nice hoodie, matching flare leggings that left little of her shape to imagination. God damn, Iâve always had a thing for flare leggings, they drive me crazy.
She was a ginger, hair like fire, though it wasnât one color; every strand a different shade, red and gold and something in-between, looking truly like fire itself, bouncing and weaving when she walked like the flames of a campfire on a late summer evening, perfectly matching the beautiful brown of her clothes. She was with a friend, joking for minutes, and her smile just made me want to melt right into my seat. She boarded Group 5, I, Group 7. Gave me a good reason to just stare as she walked by and subtly stare some more as I walked by myself. 5 rows ahead, thatâs all. Plenty close to look at her hair the entire flight, just peeking over the seat. Alas. Another counterfactual girlfriend, existing nowhere but in my imagination.

item.title: I was calling someone while waiting for the plane ...
item.description: I was calling someone while waiting for the plane to fill up, and was told that it was a bold decision to talk so loudly around other people. Yes, it's a bold decision, but bold is what I write my signature in.

item.title: So many cute girls at the beach today, god damn. T...
item.description: So many cute girls at the beach today, god damn. There was one group of 6 that had such perfect asses, tight colorful bikinis, and were full of energy and cheer. Wish they could be full of my cum, too. Only issue is that they're all almost certainly 15.

item.title: The only thing that can contend with the present i...
item.description: The only thing that can contend with the present is the past or an imagined future.

item.title: Just saw a really hot chick at the beach hit a vap...
item.description: Just saw a really hot chick at the beach hit a vape. Attractiveness instantly lowered. I thought, "Instead of sucking the vape, why don't you suck my dick?"

item.title: What if I literally just killed everyone in this c...
item.description: What if I literally just killed everyone in this coffee shop right now. It wouldn't even really be that hard. There's a basic-ass looking white dude, mid-life crisis-having for sure, with a 6/10 Asian girlfriend with a 9/10 ass with him, and I literally can just grab a pair of scissors, stab him through the eye, and kidnap her. It wouldn't even be that hard.
